item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Bette Midler
item.description: "Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world." -- Bette Midler

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Ever notice how 'What the hell' is always the right answer?" -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Who said nights were for sleep?" -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "We should all start to live before we get too old. Fear is stupid. So are regrets." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "We are all of us stars, and we deserve to twinkle." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Timothy Leary
item.description: "Women who seek to be equal with men lack ambition." -- Timothy Leary

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's not true that I had nothing on. I had the radio on." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "If I'd observed all the rules I'd never have got anywhere." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Dogs never bite me. Just humans." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Sex is part of nature. I go along with nature." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "This life is what you make it. No matter what, you're going to mess up sometimes, it's a universal truth. But the good part is you get to decide how you're going to mess it up. Girls will be your friends - they'll act like it anyway. But just remember, some come, some go. The ones that stay with you through everything - they're your true best friends. Don't let go of them. Also remember, sisters make the best friends in the world. As for lovers, well, they'll come and go too. And baby, I hate to say it, most of them - actually pretty much all of them are going to break your heart, but you can't give up because if you give up, you'll never find your soulmate. You'll never find that half who makes you whole and that goes for everything. Just because you fail once, doesn't mean you're gonna fail at everything. Keep trying, hold on, and always, always, always believe in yourself, because if you don't, then who will, sweetie? So keep your head high, keep your chin up, and most importantly, keep smiling, because life's a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "The body is meant to be seen, not all covered up." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "You never know what life is like, until you have lived it." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm very definitely a woman and I enjoy it. " -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I've been on a calendar, but never on time." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I love to do the things the censors won't pass." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "What do I wear in bed? Why, Chanel No. 5, of course" -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "We are all born sexual creatures,thank God, but it's a pity so many people despise and crush this natural gift." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I learned to walk as a baby and I haven't had a lesson since." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I am invariably late for appointments - sometimes as much as two hours. I've tried to change my ways but the things that make me late are too strong, and too pleasing." -- Marilyn Monroe
